visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis should display labels with thousands separators for four-digit numbers. The y-axis should have a title 'Rainfall (mm)'. The chart should have a custom color palette and a legend positioned at the bottom. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data starting from 9000.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis labels are formatted to include thousands separators for four-digit numbers, enhancing readability. The y-axis is titled 'Rainfall (mm)' to clearly indicate the data being represented. The data series includes monthly rainfall data starting from 9000, with a custom color of green (#008000) applied to the columns. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, providing a clear overview of the data series. The chart also includes a custom color palette for potential future series, ensuring visual consistency and distinction.
